DOC.brief_title: MAD Study Evaluating Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetic Effects N91115 Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1 study healthy subject conduct assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics N91115 . Also , comparison fast versus fed high fat meal compare PK .
